Plot: "Expendables" meets the "A-Team" in this full throttle action film, where a group of skilled mercenaries find themselves betrayed by the US government and are forced to fight their way out ...
Title: Hunted: Battle of the Drones
Writer: Mitch Gould, Jo Marr, Michael Philip
Actors: Dominique Swain, Louis Mandylor, Michael Paré, Jason Earles
